name: convert-to-inferred

schema.description: Convert existing Playwright project(s) using `@nx/playwright:playwright` executor to use `@nx/playwright/plugin`. Defaults to migrating all projects. Pass '--project' to migrate only one target.
schema.title: Convert Playwright project from executor to plugin

project.description: The project to convert from using the `@nx/playwright:playwright` executor to use `@nx/playwright/plugin`.

skipFormat.description: Whether to format files at the end of the migration.

description: Convert existing Playwright project(s) using `@nx/playwright:playwright` executor to use `@nx/playwright/plugin`.
